overview: Elegant Angel presents "Curvy Girls Vol. 7," a movie devoted to the love of thick curvy women. Starring AVN performer of the year Anikka Albrite. Watch these beautiful thick women do what they do best: FUCK! This movie was made for the fans of real natural curvy women. Enjoy!! Featuring Anikka Albrite, Alison Tyler, Keisha Grey, Olivia Austin & Bonus scene starring Siri!
title: Curvy Girls 7
